li.a: Why choose School Lane for Grades K-6?
Why choose School Lane for Grades 7-12?

div.div: Continuity of Education Plan - Click here | Elementary Campus Parent Portal for Remote Learning - Click here

div.p: School Lane aims to develop inquiring, knowledgeable and caring young people who will help create a better and more peaceful world. In our community of active learners, we strive for high achievement, value diversity and equity, practice international mindedness, and collaborate to solve problems.
